article: representatives of swiss commercial banks and holocaust survivors are expected to present the final details of a $ #.## billion restitution settlement to a federal judge next week after two of the largest banks agreed to give the survivors ' lawyers access to databases containing information on #.# million nazi-era accounts , the lead lawyer for the survivors said friday .
